Todo List

page Main Page
Although wxSkin works properly in most cases, there still is some bug testing to do. Some things are still in a "planning" state, others might not work as expected.
  • Support "proper" resizing for "complex" frames on all platforms (currently GTK is a bit buggy)
  • Sliders need some improvement regarding skinning and handling, as well as the ability to create it vertically.
  • Fix some deprecation warnings on Mac
  • Add font loading support
  • Add the ability to use GIF animations (e.g. for fancy moving progressbars)
  • Add a "knob" control that can be controled with the mouse
